title: Is it permissible to pray on the bed? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: um shab says he's been praying on the bed for so long what to do what was in the past is in the past it's accepted inshallah because of your ignorance of the ruling however praying on the bed is permissible providing that the bed and the mattress itself is hard when I put my forehead and my hands it does not they do not sink rather they're is a hard surface that I can place my forehead and hands and knees Etc on and if this is the case the prayers is valid
